channel.title: CVE Feed for IEEE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IEEE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-27861|2024-09-16T16:47:46.467Z -- ieee -- 802.2
item.description: Layer 2 network filtering capabilities such as IPv6 RA guard can be bypassed using LLC/SNAP headers with invalid length (and optionally VLAN0 headers)

item.title: CVE-2021-27853|2024-09-16T19:30:07.552Z -- ieee -- 802.2
item.description: Layer 2 network filtering capabilities such as IPv6 RA guard or ARP inspection can be bypassed using combinations of VLAN 0 headers and LLC/SNAP headers.

item.title: CVE-2021-27862|2024-09-16T20:43:01.727Z -- ieee -- 802.2
item.description: Layer 2 network filtering capabilities such as IPv6 RA guard can be bypassed using LLC/SNAP headers with invalid length and Ethernet to Wifi frame conversion (and optionally VLAN0 headers).
